sentences.sentence: The centuried Domaine Comte Georges de Vogue who makes extremely expressive wines are recognized as the king of Chambolle-Musigny.
sentences.translation: 历史悠久的武戈伯爵酒庄持有大片的特级园地块被尊称为香波-慕西尼的王者。

sentences.sentence: To find the right domaine name, you can of course brainstorm and try to be creative.
sentences.translation: 要找到你的域名，你当然可以来场头脑风暴并焕发你的创造力。

sentences.sentence: The owner of the domaine bott frere-mrs. nicole bott will be present to introduce her wines.
sentences.translation: 酒庄所有人尼科尔？鲍特女士将出席品酒会，并向大家介绍家族生产的精品葡萄酒。
